title: Does the Mema accurately describe "why is it a big deal, Kamala Harris is the vice president? '
subtitle: Harris made history several times when she was sworn as Vice President of the United States on 20 January 2021.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Mimi accurately describes the distinction that Kamala Harris, a black woman, faced under the command of the former Vice-President of the United States.
